Less than two weeks to QHacks 2018!

QHacks 2018 is right around the corner. We wanted to take a second to send you some more information:

Remember to RSVP!

We can't wait to have you at QHacks 2018, but you still have to RSVP on the QHacks Dashboard before Wednesday, January 24th at 11:59 PM EST!

RSVP NOW

Travel Details

If you have filled out one of the bus Google Form or emailed travel@qhacks.io, we'll be sending out more information by email tonight around 11:59 PM EST. If you still want to secure a spot on one of the buses, please fill outthe appropriate form below:

  • Waterloo StdLib Bus: goo.gl/forms/n1ajtZVIx1xZUWcA2
  • Waterloo Sun Life Bus: goo.gl/forms/icXNcw0peSkJOl6m2
  • University of Toronto iGan Partners Bus: goo.gl/forms/HrLTQezfzHtqUhV23
  • University of Toronto StdLib Bus: goo.gl/forms/FLUQhAfivOXngWAp2
  • McGill and Carleton iGan Partners Bus: goo.gl/forms/sd8XvXiiWqijRQNA3

If you are coming from a city without a bus, we will be offering travel reimbursements. If you require a travel reimbursement, please email travel@qhacks.io by 10:00PM EST on Wednesday, January 24. If you do not email us by that time, we cannot guarantee will be able to process your request.

We've had a lot of interest in the buses, so we've decided to guarantee a spot on the bus for anyone who volunteers as a bus coordinator. This position involves taking attendance on the bus and being the main point of contact for the QHacks team on the bus. If you are interested in being a bus coordinator, please email travel@qhacks.io .

Other Stuff You Probably Want To Know

Make sure to join the QHacks 2018 Slack. This will be our main method of communication during the event, so download the Slack mobile app to your phone too!

Given the sheer number of hacker applications, we ask that if you can no longer attend, please withdraw your application on the QHacks Dashboard so you give someone on the waitlist the opportunity to attend.

In the meantime, stay tuned on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for announcements about cool events and prizes. If you have any questions, you can reply directly to this email or email hello@qhacks.io. We can't wait to see what you create at QHacks 2018!

See you soon,

The QHacks Team
